post_message: Thank you for all the kind words of encouragement leading up to the debate tonight. I know I don't stand alone, as We the People stand together to Heal, Inspire and Revive. post_message: Special debate coverage: Amy Goodman and Nermeen Shaikh host a pre-debate roundtable from 8-9PM ET with Kimberl√© Williams Crenshaw, Melina Abdullah of Black Lives Matter - Los Angeles, Gyasi Ross, Soraya Chemaly, The Intercept's Lee Fang and Rashid Khalidi, followed by an expanded debate giving third party candidates a chance to respond to town hall questions. Jill Stein of the Green Party joins us from St. Louis starting 10:30PM ET. Tune in at democracynow.org/debate & post questions for our guests using #expandingthedebate.
